about_the_game:
Relive the wilderness of Quench


The Quench Official Soundtrack follows Shepherd and Shaman's grand pilgrimage as they meet new friends and restore the world on their way to the Eastern Elder Tree. Composed by Adam Sakiyama with additional music by Robby Duguay.

Track List


1. Adam Sakiyama - Prologue
2. Adam Sakiyama - Journey From Home
3. Robby Duguay - Pilgrimage
4. Adam Sakiyama - Shaman's Lullaby
5. Adam Sakiyama - The Crossing
6. Adam Sakiyama - Veldt Dance
7. Adam Sakiyama - Canyon March
8. Robby Duguay - Omens
9. Adam Sakiyama - Dusk Lament
10. Robby Duguay - Twisting Paths
11. Adam Sakiyama - Progress and Peril
12. Robby Duguay - Fair Game
13. Adam Sakiyama - Midday Prowl
14. Robby Duguay - Encroaching Fires
15. Adam Sakiyama - Not To Be Forgotten
16. Adam Sakiyama - Wandering Spirits
17. Robby Duguay - Peaceful Grove
18. Adam Sakiyama - Restoration

Quench OST album art was created by Yusra Shahid. Pixel Pilgrimage art was created by Lu Nascimento.
